damn it! D: this one is dead! let it download for 24 hours, and afterwards, it was still at 0% and it said 0 seeders 0 leechers.
I take that back, the torrent is just fine, and it's not dead. uTorrent wasn't happy with me at the time.

Thanks to the uploader & seeders. 

I'm going to dl, pause for a few days, and then will upload past 1:1.

From my speed, I suspect some people are being torrent-whores.

Awesome; thanks a ton man. 

I'll seed well.
Awesome, thanks bro: I'll seed past 1:1 - it's great quality.
Nice work !! you are great man!!!

the audio (at least in apocalypse) is horrible quality.  it's majorly lacking low end and is heavily distorted during scenes with intense sounds.

video is meh but i wasn't expecting hd quality with this much compression.

i normally steer clear of these kinds of releases (heavily compressed hd rips) but i didn't have much of a choice as the films are dated and all the other "720p" rips aren't seeded all that well.

if you're going to watch these on your phone or tablet your good, you could probably watch it on your laptop, but that's as far as i'd go.  anything else and you'll notice the compression a lot.
